In order to provide you better service and experience in our platform.We had finished the upgrade and maintenance for our system during May 21th and 22th.We apologize for your inconvenience.For the compensation,we decide to cancel the transaction fee for all CoinBene users for 1 month.Every user could transact for free in our platform during 00:00 May 24th to 00:00 June 22th.And we sincerely apologize again.Thanks to all users for your understanding and supporting!

Our Perpetual Contract activity has been upgraded, CoinBene invite you come and join us!
 During the activity, as long as you log in and enter the contract trade page or asset page, you can gain 2 BTC as your experience fund.
 You will have the chance to win more than 1500 USDT and have the privilege of 0 trading fee. Besides you can have unlimited USDT as rewards. Multiple benefits are waiting for you.
 Contract trade has risk, please make sure you understand the user agreement and related trading rules in the contract guide.
Get 1BTC at zero cost. It’s time to hold a @CoinBene perpetual contract!
To me, the past is black and white， but the future is always color
You\'re more powerful than you think
Risk everything. Winner stays. There\'s no greater danger than playing it safe.

Cross Margin: All positions share the same margin balance
Fixed Margin: Each position is treated as an individual unit, P&L are calculated independently
There are positions or open orders, you could not change the margin mode
Note: The results may differ from the transaction results due to the fees, funding rates and actual transaction prices
Fixed prices do not fluctuate with the market
Setting a floating ratio allows you to trade at a percentage above or below the market real-time reference price

You can use the following methods to purchase a digital currency in fiat money
First purchase a stable token through %s, and then use the token to purchase other digital currency through %s
Leveraged trading allows investors to invest in larger assets, and expected returns and risks are simultaneously amplified
I have read and agreed the terms in CoinBene
The user has a risk of being flat and losing free assets. Investors should confirm that they are aware of this danger and prudently invest.
risk rate = total asset / (loaned amount + interest )*100%
The liquidation will be triggered when the risk rate is 110%
Part of funds can be transferred out when the risk 110% rate is higher than 125%
Given your account might have risk, it has forbidden to transfer. Please contact official support.

USDT Contract is the derivative of digital currency that is launched by CoinBene platform. Through Leverage service, investors can put more asset into the market, the expected earnings and risks are enlarged concurrently, users are faced with liquidation or loss of personal assets, investors shall confirm that they are aware of the risks and should be cautious about investment.
I have read and agreed with CoinBene《USDT Contract Agreement》

BTC Contract is the derivative of digital currency that is launched by CoinBene platform. Through Leverage service, investors can put more asset into the market, the expected earnings and risks are enlarged concurrently, users are faced with liquidation or loss of personal assets, investors shall confirm that they are aware of the risks and should be cautious about investment.
I have read and agreed with CoinBene《BTC Contract Agreement》
This address is only for ETH deposit. Please do not deposit other ERC-20 tokens to this address.\nIf you have deposited, the token will not be received.
This address is only used for USDT deposit on the Ethereum chain. Please do not deposit other ERC-20 tokens to this address.\nIf you have deposited, the token will not be received.
You have been restricted from transferring, please contact customer service if you have any questions
The order with specified price and quantity will be closed only if the market price is less than or equal to the user’s limit price
Without specified price, the order will be closed by buying or selling at the best price of the current market
Specifying a trigger price,when the trigger price is met, a limit order with preset price and quantity will be sent to the market
Specifying a trigger price,when the trigger price is met, a market order with preset buying amount and quantity will be sent to the market
Specifying a limit order and a trigger limit order, when the conditions of the limit order or trigger order are met, one order will be automatically generated and the other will be cancelled
Specifying a limit order and a trigger market order, when the conditions of the limit order or trigger order are met, one order will be automatically generated and the other will be cancelled
You could not change leverage when You have open orders
Start the journey of digital wealth
The current leverage is high, please be aware of the risks.

When the latest price reaches the Stop Profit / Stop Loss price, the system automatically closes your position. However, it is not guaranteed to close a certain position successfully. Please note the following: \n1. When the trigger price is reached, if the quantity that can be closed is insufficient, the position will fail to close, and the system will automatically cancel the order \n2. when the market price changes too much, the position will fail to close and the system will automatically cancel the order
Stop profit price can not be lower than order price
Stop loss price can not exceed order price
Stop profit price can not exceed order price
Stop loss price can not be lower than order price
When the trigger price is reached, the quantity that can be closed is insufficient or the market price changes too much, the position will be closed and the system will automatically cancel the order
This indicator shows your order in the auto partial liquidation queue. If the all indicator lights are on, your position may be reduced after the liquidation
10% float from best price to market

In flash liquidation, the system trade at the best price of market. When the market fluctuates violently and the price exceeding 10% of the initial closing price, the rest open position will stop closing position.
